description: John is a landlord who owns several properties in the downtown area and manages them personally.
relationship: Mike is John’s friend who owns the local hardware store “Handyman’s Haven” and chats with John about property management on Slack. John’s tenant Sarah is three months behind on rent, and he is considering an eviction notice. John also coordinates with a property-management team, contractor Bob, a city inspector, and a local realtor regarding maintenance, renovations, and market trends.
